title: We have the words of life. Why do we not bring them to the ears of the humiliated? Why do we not hunt down those with crushed hearts?
author: joshualinog
labels: Foolish gospel | Messiah failed | weakness of God
excerpt: Do we really have the power to become all things to all people and save some of them?
content:
Do we really have the power to become all things to all people and save some of them? 

Can we really save people who without our choice to save them will die 

By suicide? 
Inwardly by self-loathing and rejection?
By alcoholism? 
By drug overdoses? 
By violence? 
By being walled in by emptiness and screens?
By enslavement and captivity of the enemy?
